cause.description:
Right now in Uganda, Africa, there are millions of children dying of hunger, poverty, and war each day. Children as young as five and many of them orphaned by Africa's AIDS scourge, are in constant danger of being abducted by the mysterious rebel group Lord's Resistance Army, to fight in a twenty-year-old civil war. Rebel leader, Joseph Kony, wished to rule Uganda, abducting and killing thousands of children and displacing nearly two million people. Fear has overcome these children, forcing them to run from their homes and sleep in abandoned buildings, therefore becoming “invisible”. A truce was signed in August, but the survivors still need to rebuild their community and pay for their necessities, and that is where our club comes in.
Visit www.invisiblechildren.com for more ways you can help.
Donations by personal check can also be addressed to Invisible Children and mailed to:
Invisible Children 2705 Via Orange Way, Suite B Spring Valley, CA 91978
Tax receipts will be provided typically within 2-3 weeks of your donation. Thank you again for your support - you are changing lives.
1. Help rebuild the community in Uganda, Africa.
2. Better the lives of people in Uganda!
3. Provide better school systems for children.
cause.mission: To raise money and awareness for the children soldiers in Africa and to recover from a 20-year-old war.
